Class DatabaseManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.activities.DBManagement

  • public class DatabaseManagement
extends Activity
    Activity for resetting the database tables for the current event or removing all of them from the database
    Version:
    %I%
    Author:
    Andrew Messing

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Creates the Database Management Activity, helper objects for each of the database tables for the current event, and sets the click listener for each of the reset/remove buttons.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - The Bundle containing anything saved from the last time this activity was used.

      • onClick

        public void onClick(View v)
        Provides the action that happens when any of the buttons is clicked
        Parameters:
        v - The view that is clicked (in this case one of the buttons on the page)
